review: over heats and freezes a lot. reloads or re-buffers a lot too. Finally had to exchange for different Roku model.

review: A great buy, I love it. If your hearing is going don't hesitate to buy. It puts the sound right to your ears. All that plus added channels. No monthly fees. It does not get better then this.

review: Like new and it works perfectly.
